item.title: Multipliers
item.description: Some leaders are Multipliers and some are Diminishers. Multipliers make everyone around them smarter and more productive. Diminishers do the opposite. This book teaches people how to be Multipliers by describing the 5 disciplines (behaviors) of Multipliers. Multipliers on the web YouTube: Introduction to Multipliers - 4 minutes - Liz Wiseman speaking at a business conference The Push/Pull of Leadership - 3 minutes - Liz Wiseman speak to Standford eCorner - … a story that illustrates how great leaders help their employees overcome struggles, while also remembering to step away and hand back responsibility to give them a chance to grow and gain confidence.
